alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:57PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Yalobusha and northeastern Tallahatchie Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scobey, or near Charleston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Coffeeville, Paynes, Scobey, Oakland, Bryant, Leverett, Gums, Cascilla, Tillatoba and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
